description.@en: My years of staying out of my betters’ way have taught me to blend into my surroundings without so much as a nod of acknowledgment.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you fail an Eavesdrop or Stealth Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to hide among crowds.
